job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about using and embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly in high-quality software solutions? Do you have a knack for DevOps practices and experience with cloud environments? We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users while being enjoyable to develop.

   As a DevOps Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer

Are you passionate about using and embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly in high-quality software solutions? Do you have a knack for DevOps practices and experience with cloud environments? We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users while being enjoyable to develop.

   As a DevOps Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.

profile_classification.rationale: The job title is 'DevOps Engineer' and while it mentions GenAI, the core responsibilities focus on DevOps practices, solution delivery, and automation rather than deep ML/GenAI model development or fine-tuning. The emphasis is on 'using and embedding' GenAI, not building it from scratch.

phrases: Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business needs, translate them into technical requirements, and ensure solutions deliver value.

phrases: design, build, and run cutting-edge software solutions
end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment
Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building, deploying, and maintaining software systems, including reusable components and ensuring robustness.

phrases: DevOps practices
experience with cloud environments
end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment
Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions
Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
job_tasks.justification: The job title itself is 'DevOps Engineer', and the responsibilities explicitly mention DevOps practices, deployment, automation, and running solutions in production.

phrases: cloud environments
technologies.justification: Mentions experience with cloud environments, a common platform for DevOps and GenAI solutions.

phrases: Generative AI (GenAI)
GenAI solutions
technologies.justification: The job explicitly mentions working with Generative AI models and solutions.

phrases: collaborate with internal teams and clients
Work directly with stakeholders
Collaborate with team members through pair-programming
Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders
soft_skills.justification: Multiple phrases highlight the need for collaboration with various groups, including internal teams, clients, and peers.

phrases: passionate about using and embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly
innovative solutions
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on using new technologies like GenAI and developing innovative solutions implies a need for continuous learning and adaptation.

phrases: design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions that bring value to users while being enjoyable to develop
responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness
tackle critical challenges
cost-effective GenAI solutions
robust and maintainable
enhance productivity and scalability
soft_skills.justification: The description focuses on delivering valuable, high-quality, cost-effective, robust, and scalable solutions, indicating a pragmatic problem-solving approach.

phrases: embedding Generative AI (GenAI) responsibly
responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions
soft_skills.justification: The job explicitly mentions the need to use GenAI 'responsibly'.

phrases: design, build, and run cutting-edge solutions
develop innovative solutions
end-to-end solution delivery
Develop reusable components
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'cutting-edge', 'innovative', and 'end-to-end delivery' suggest a proactive and ownership-driven approach to developing new solutions.
